resources.string: This is a new feature to check if your phone have any issues. For now you can tap the button at top to check battery usage summary by yourself. We will add more checking items soon.
Please tell us more detail about your issue, so we can address it ASAP.
Would you like to restart it to effect your change?
Choose default action for Long Press
Tap to remove the application from ignore list
Start up automatically when restart your phone
Show icon on notification bar to switch easily
Set height of running list item
Check this to display buttons at top, otherwise display buttons at bottom. Need restart.
Choose a default action for Click
Choose a default action for Long Press
Choose a default level for Auto Kill
If you choose When screen off, it need restart to apply the change.
Set security level to low to show more apps, need restart
loading, it might take several minutes
Ignore service and front apps automatically. Otherwise they would display as green text, you can Long Press on them and Force Stop them.

Do you want to ignore service and front apps automatically? Since you are using Android 2.2 or later version. If you want to display services and front apps, you have to force stop them manually. Also they would be display as green text. Or you can go to settings to change it later.
Summary of how battery has been used

"1. If you are using Android 2.2 or later version. Services and front apps(The Green items in the running list) cannot be killed directly, you have to force stop them manually. You can go to settings to ignore them automatically. 2. Ignore System apps: after you tapping OK button, it would build a ignore list automatically for you. You can go to settings to change the ignore list later."
Your device does not support this feature
